description: Erection of a ground floor side extension and a roof extension to provide an additional storey, along with window replacement and the installation of solar panels on the roof.
decision_conditions:
<p>The proposed windows in the eastern (rear) elevation at second floor level shall be obscure glazed.</p><p>

REASON: To prevent overlooking and maintain privacy levels for the neighbouring properties.</p>

<p>Details of the 1.8m high obscured boundary treatment, to be installed on the front roof terrace is to be submitted for approval prior to installation.&nbsp;</p><p>Reason: To prevent overlooking the adjoining property located at 9 Ormsby Place.</p>

<p>Prior to the use of the approved roof addition, details in the form of elevation plans and detailed specifications must be provided showing the proposed bee brick and nesting box.</p><p><br></p><p>REASON: To enhance local biodiversity.</p><div><br></div>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
